subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi surpassed Gerd Müller’s mark for goals in a year, but Messi’s legacy will seem incomplete unless he helps Argentina win a World Cup.
snippet: Lionel Messi surpassed Gerd Müller’s mark for goals in a year, but Messi’s legacy will seem incomplete unless he helps Argentina win a World Cup.
